attributes.action: STOP employers to reduce hours of pregnant employee on zero contract (SMP)
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition to stop employers to change or reduce pregnant employee time hours on zero contract who are qualified to have SMP. Please sign this petition, share and aware others to sign to help pregnant employees to get SMP on Zero Contract without going through any problems.
attributes.background: Employee under zero contract, even after being fully qualified to have Statutory Maternity Pay (SMP), there are few many employers who have cut off their employee hours to less than £112 per week, so they can avoid SMP. This has ruined those pregnant employees rights to have SMP under zero contract.
